title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Phil Mickelson's great win at 50. BLM at it again in Minneapolis. Mask hypocrisy. Pompeo on the ChiComs and covid-19. Dr. Fauci figures out the virus could have come from a lab. Rush told us all of this last year: The ChiComs weaponized the virus. Cedric Richmond, Susan Collins on Biden's massive "infrastructure" bill. Rush on how Democrats spend and spend and spend and call it "infrastructure" -- or whatever they need to call it to make people think it's needed. January 6th commission? How about a Chinese biological warfare commission? Roy Blunt and Scott Brown on January 6th commission. Rush warned us about these commissions.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

New York Attorney General Letitia James is moving to put new limits on the police. Pat Brosnan, former NYPD detective, reacts. Senator Cory Booker on "police reform". Rush on why liberals always want to hold police accountable, but liberals are never held accountable for their failed policies. Chicago Mayor Lightfoot is racist, refusing interviews with white reporters. Eugene Chung, who is Korean, says he was told he was "not the right minority" while interviewing for an NFL coaching job this off-season. Rush knew the Rooney Rule was BS because it wasn't racism, but nepotism keeping African-Americans from getting coaching jobs. Monday Musings: Rush on how bipartisanship in Washington really just means the GOP caves to Democrats. We're back to the Jimmy Carter years and Keynesian economics.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

The Democrat Party is the party of Wall Street. Minneapolis caller on BLM and the lack of law and order in blue states. Phil Mickelson's big win. Rush on the last time Phil Mickelson offended the golf snobs. Caller loves Jason Lewis, wants him to go back to Congress, take the country back. EIB High Note: covid-sniffing dogs!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
